extension.name: Multilingual Field
extension.description: Create a textbox field for each language defined in the Preferences as Language Redirect making easy to create content in multiple languages.

releases.release: - Add multilingual handles to work with localized URL params - Add compatibility with tinyMCE formatter - Add compatibility with Publish Filtering extension by Nick Dunn(http://github.com/nickdunn/publishfiltering)
- Added full support for frontend submit (create/update).

- Requires Language Redirect 1.0.2 or higher - Use the standard Multilingual class from Language Redirect 1.0.2 - Add option to enable / disable the generation of unique handles for single line fields. - Bug fix in character counter.
- Add an option to the fields definition to set if field has to show the values of default language when the value of selected language is empty.
